author: Dustin Randall

review: The Google Chromecast easily installed on my Apple iPad and it's great to watch "You Tube" videos but I was hoping that it would allow streaming of videos from network web sites.  I can watch old issues of TV shows on my iPad but was thinking it would be great to be able to stream them to our larger television.  Well, you can't do that.  Hopefully in the future the networks and Google will come to an agreement to allow that.  It can't take that much of a change in software to make that work.  The Chromecast is a great idea with a fantastic price but for me it needs more applications!  One other complaint.  Please tell us what's in the box.  I thought I would need an HDMI cable so bought one at the same time I bought the Chromecast.  You don't need additional cables!  I can't send it back because postage is more than the cost of the cable.  Come on Amazon, let us know what comes in the box!
